gen.success: stalked their prey with the patience of generations of hunters past.
gen.fail: got distracted mere minutes after being sent out, completely forgetting the hunt.

gen.success: pursued their prey relentlessly, until they finally had it in their claws.
gen.fail: wasn't fast enough this time, and their prey escaped.

gen.success: tracked their prey across many miles, demonstrating remarkable skill.
gen.fail: was not able to pick up any fresh scent trails, and ended up going in circles.

one.success: traversed scorching terrain, showing great resilience and determination, to catch this.
one.fail: burned their pawpads on the hot ground and was unable to continue.

one.success: braved the arid climate and found some easy prey weakened from dehydration.
one.fail: collapsed from heatstroke and had to be summoned home.

two.success: plunged beneath the surface and revealed a hidden talent for swimming. They also caught this.
two.fail: made a splash, but wasn't able to catch anything.

two.success: dove into the water and surfaced, dripping from head to toe, with an armful of prey.
two.fail: nearly drowned in the deeper water, crawling ashore soaked and empty-handed.

three.success: camouflaged so well into their surroundings, their prey never saw them coming until it was too late.
three.fail: accidentally kicked a rock, causing their prey to spook and run away.

three.success: used every aspect of the terrain to their advantage, dropping onto their prey from above.
three.fail: stuck their foot in a hole and tripped, falling flat on their face.
